name: DEATHREADS UNISEX SKULL FADE OUT TEE
description:
DEATHREADS: A combination of the words DEATH and THREADS. Taking Day of the Dead to the extreme!

You are looking at a pretty incredible tee. A shockingly creepy Day of the Dead graphic skull tee that fades out as it approaches the side of the piece. A pretty subdues location for the location of the graphic but very eye catching! The shirt will have our freaky logo on the back with corresponding shirt size. No bothersome inner tags.

The shirt is made of high end American Apparel 100% cotton. For those not familiar with this brand, it is extremely high quality cotton that is very soft to the touch and very durable.

These shirts are form fitting and appeal to both men and women. 

Perfect for those fascinated with the macabre or for those 
Day of the Dead fans. Great apparel for those looking for a limited production design that is not readily available.

deathreads@hotmail.com for any questions or any design ideas.

name: DEATHREADS UNISEX BODYBUILDER FREAKY TEE
description:
A hand drawn highly unique trademarked bodybuilder Day of the Dead design. Incredible detail throughout this piece. There is nothing out there currently like this shirt. Perfect for both bodybuilders or fans of Day of the Dead. Form fitting and perfect for both men and women.

Taking Day of the Dead to the extreme! 

These shirts are made from extremely high quality 100% American Apparel cotton. If you are familiar with this brand, you know it is very smooth and very durable. 

A perfect shirt when killing it at the gym!

This tee will also have our DEATHREADS logo on the back as well.  No inner tag to drive you crazy. 

Email us at deathreads@hotmail.com with any questions or design ideas.

name: DEATHREADS UNISEX BODYBUILDING TEE
description:
A killer cross between a bodybuilder with a Day of the Dead skull. Totally unique from what is out there currently. When you are committed to the gym, you want to wear something that complements your hard work and makes you stand out from the rest. This shirt is made from top quality American Apparel cotton, a very high quality 100% cotton. It has bold graphics and features our DEATHREADS logo on the back. 
This shirt is perfect for obvious bodybuilders and Day of the Dead fans but also for individuals searching for that limited edition shirt.

These shirts are extremely high quality, form fitting anf perfect for both men and women.

Email us at deathreads@hotmail.com for any questions or ideas you may have.
